Class TitleScreenState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.state.ClientControllerState
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.state.TitleScreenState
public class TitleScreenState extends ClientControllerState
Represents the state of the client at username selection.
